name: pythagorastheorem
0:
”Alexa, open pythagoras theorem”
”Alexa, open pythagoras theorem and find hypotenuse where base is 4 and height is 3”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pythagoras theorem
des: This skill uses Pythagoras Theorem to find hypotenuse of a right angled triangle where height and base is given. You can say "Alexa, open Pythagoras Theorem and find hypotenuse where base is 4 and height is 3"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
